title: My second post
description: A short description of the post.
contents:
Distill is a publication format for scientific and technical writing, native to the web.
Learn more about using Distill at https://rstudio.github.io/distill.

title: Welcome to Shane's Little Data Science Blog
description:
Welcome to our new blog, Shane's Little Data Science Blog. We hope you enjoy 
reading what we have to say!
contents: Here is my first blog post. There are many like it, but this one is mine.
